_meta.purpose: HYPOTHETICAL - Committee briefing materials for COMM_EVT phase
_meta.note: This is a hypothetical/placeholder artifact. It represents what would be generated by draft_committee_briefing_comm_evt agent in COMM_EVT phase after committee_referral is confirmed.

assumptions: System has advanced to COMM_EVT phase
Committee referral external event has been confirmed
INTRO_FRAME and INTRO_WHITEPAPER have been approved via HR_PRE
Committee assignment is known (hypothetical: Senate Energy and Natural Resources)
scenario.purpose: Demonstrate structure and content of committee briefing packet artifact

committee_briefing_packet.committee_name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
committee_briefing_packet.committee_jurisdiction: Energy policy, natural resources, public lands

executive_summary.policy_proposal: [HYPOTHETICAL] Policy proposal aligned with approved INTRO_FRAME and INTRO_WHITEPAPER
key_objectives: Address regulatory gaps identified in concept memo
Support industry innovation and market development
executive_summary.committee_relevance: Direct alignment with committee jurisdiction on energy policy
executive_summary.urgency_rationale: Regulatory window and industry signals indicate timely opportunity

policy_framing.opposition_mitigation: Counter-narrative prepared based on opposition risk assessment

technical_content.legal_precedents: References to recent court rulings and legal framework (from signal scan)

talking_points: Strong alignment with member's policy priorities

vote_prediction.note: HYPOTHETICAL prediction based on available intelligence

pre_hearing: Member-level meetings with key committee members

identified_risks: Opposition may mobilize during committee process
Competing priorities may delay committee action
Amendment risks that could alter policy intent

review_requirements.note: This artifact requires HR_LANG approval before use in committee process

state_advancement.verification: This artifact does NOT advance legislative state. System remains in INTRO_EVT. COMM_EVT is NOT active.

review_gate_satisfaction.verification: This artifact does NOT satisfy HR_LANG review gate. No approvals are implied. Review gate remains NOT_STARTED.

execution_authorization.verification: This artifact does NOT authorize any execution actions. All execution agents remain BLOCKED.

real_data_usage.verification: No real committees, bill numbers, member names, or dates are used. All content is fictional.

committee_referral_assumption.verification: This artifact does NOT assume committee_referral has occurred. Committee referral remains PENDING.

system_modification.verification: This artifact does NOT modify agent-registry.json, review queues, or legislative-state.json.

disclaimer: This artifact is HYPOTHETICAL and SPECULATIVE. It represents a placeholder structure for what a committee briefing packet would contain in COMM_EVT phase. It assumes system advancement to COMM_EVT and committee referral confirmation. All content, member names, and recommendations are fictional examples for demonstration purposes only. This artifact is fictional and for development reference only. It does not represent real data, authorized actions, or system state.
